Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2019 04:10PM Cancer1234 wrote: So I called ,just yesterday 2/19, Novartis on this : new "Managed Access Program" (NCT03706573) has been established to allow access to Alpelisib for eligible patients diagnosed with HR+ MBC who have a PI3KCA mutation They said the trial is not available ? That I need to keep looking at site to see when " recruiting" I explained "managed access " right to try (" really right to ask ) and why on Trials.gov , etc. Very unhelpful. Would not give any info to me, said not sure hwy posted on site . They said have my Dr call back..I was trying to get info for him. Is anyone using this managed access program ? I have ( 2 ) PIK3 mutations , progression on Ibrance, one to many AIs for the BYlieve trial . Would love to try Alpelisib before moving on to afintor or ????
Posts.Title: SABCS 2018 Update (Sorry, Very Long!) Bestbird Frisky
